TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TaskCompletionSource`1<TResult> extends System.Object
generic <typename TResult> public ref class TaskCompletionSource

typeparam.name: TResult
typeparam.span: 与此相关联的结果值的类型。

span.span: The type of the result value associated with this .

summary.span: Represents the producer side of a unbound to a delegate, providing access to the consumer side through the property.

span.span: Represents the producer side of a unbound to a delegate, providing access to the consumer side through the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在许多情况下，最好先启用来表示外部异步操作。In many scenarios, it is useful to enable a to represent an external asynchronous operation. 为此目的提供。 is provided for this purpose. 这样，可以分发给使用者任务的创建。It enables the creation of a task that can be handed out to consumers. 使用者可以在与它们在处理任务成员变量的任何其他方案时使用该任务的成员相同的方式。The consumers can use the members of the task the same way as they would in any other scenario handling task member variables. 但是，与大多数任务由 TaskCompletionSource 创建的任务的状态显式由控制 TaskCompletionSource 上的方法。However, unlike most tasks, the state of a task created by a TaskCompletionSource is controlled explicitly by the methods on TaskCompletionSource. 这样，外部传播到基础任务的异步操作的完成。This enables the completion of the external asynchronous operation to be propagated to the underlying Task. 分离还可确保使用者不能转换而无需访问相应的 TaskCompletionSource 状态。The separation also ensures that consumers are not able to transition the state without access to the corresponding TaskCompletionSource. 有关详细信息，请参阅文章[TaskCompletionSource 性质\](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/the-nature-of-taskcompletionsourcetresult/)并行编程与.NET 博客中。For more information, see the entry [The Nature of TaskCompletionSource\](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/the-nature-of-taskcompletionsourcetresult/) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog. [并行扩展示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=165717)还包含有关如何使用的示例。The [Parallel Extensions samples](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=165717) also contain examples of how to use . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用:The following example shows how to use a : [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.taskcompletionsource/cs/taskcompletionsource.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.taskcompletionsource/vb/taskcompletionsource.vb#01)]

threadsafe.span: 所有成员是线程安全的可能从多个线程同时使用。

span.span: All members of are thread-safe and may be used from multiple threads concurrently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使使用者可以访问受此实例。This property enables a consumer to access the that is controlled by this instance. 当您创建对象，属性的对象返回 When you create a object, the property of this object returns ， ， ，和方法 （和"尝试"变体） 对此实例中对此的相关状态转换的所有结果基础任务。The , , , and methods (and their "Try" variants) on this instance all result in the relevant state transitions on this underlying Task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作将返回 false 如果已在三种最终状态之一： ， ，或。This operation will return false if the is already in one of the three final states: , , or . 此方法也返回 false，如果基础已被释放。This method also returns false if the underlying has already been disposed.
